cobblemon.species.arceus.name: Arceus
cobblemon.species.arceus.desc1: It is the heavenly fount from which pours the light that shines across Hisui. Its luminance guides and protects all Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.arceus.desc2: Hisuian mythology states that Arceus is the creator of all things.

cobblemon.species.deoxys.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxys.desc1: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deoxys.desc2: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
cobblemon.species.deoxysattack.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxysattack.desc1: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deoxysattack.desc2: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
cobblemon.species.deoxysdefense.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxysdefense.desc1: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deoxysdefense.desc2: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
cobblemon.species.deoxysspeed.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxysspeed.desc1: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deoxysspeed.desc2: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.

Calcium §5
Increases Special Attack EVs by 10

HP Up §5
Increases HP EVs by 10
item.cobblemon.zinc:
Zinc §5
Increases Special Defense EVs by 10
cobblemon.species.copperajahgmax.name: CopperajahGmax
cobblemon.species.copperajahgmax.desc: These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.
cobblemon.species.eeveegmax.name: EeveeGmax
cobblemon.species.eeveegmax.desc: Harbors the potential to evolve into manifold forms. Within Eevee lies the key to the mysteries of Pokémon evolution—I'm certain of it.
cobblemon.species.meowthgmax.name: MeowthGmax
cobblemon.species.meowthgmax.desc: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.
cobblemon.species.drednawgmax.name: DrednawGmax
cobblemon.species.drednawgmax.desc: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.
cobblemon.species.melmetalgmax.name: MelmetalGmax
cobblemon.species.melmetalgmax.desc: Centrifugal force is behind the punches of Melmetal’s heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.butterfreegmax.name: ButterfreeGmax
cobblemon.species.butterfreegmax.desc: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
cobblemon.species.duraludongmax.name: DuraludonGmax
cobblemon.species.duraludongmax.desc: The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.
